listitem.para: A default constructor, and the IrrKlang engine is being started right here
A destructor, and the IrrKlang engine is being dropped right here
Where the initialization of the ISoundSource and ISound pointers begin.
An update function to update the player's position, target and up. Be warn that if this function is being updated too many times, it will cause inefficiency.

parameterdescription.para: - target of / where the player is looking at
- the up vector of the player.

listitem.para: A method functions dedicated to just play Darth Vader theme as a background music

parameterdescription.para: if the source file of the music cannot be found, nothing is played

parameterdescription.para: if the source file of the music cannot be found, nothing is played

parameterdescription.para: if the source file of the music cannot be found, nothing is played

parameterdescription.para: if the source file of the music cannot be found, nothing is played

parameterdescription.para: if the source file of the music cannot be found, nothing is played

listitem.para: A method functions dedicated to play a Lullaby as a background music

parameterdescription.para: if the source file cannot be found, nothing is played

listitem.para: A method functions dedicated to just play the 3D gate sound effect

parameterdescription.para: if the source file of the music cannot be found, nothing is played

listitem.para: A method functions dedicated to just play the 3D effect of 'I am Your Father'

parameterdescription.para: - the position of the object which will play out this sound
if the source file of the music cannot be found, nothing is played

listitem.para: A method functions dedicated to just play the 3D effect of 'Join the Dark Side'

parameterdescription.para: - position of the object to play this sound
if the source file of the music cannot be found, nothing is played

listitem.para: A method functions to stop all sounds
return true / false if the sound effects are being played

simplesect.para: true - if either 1 of the sound effects are being played
false - if no sound effect is played

briefdescription.para: A class to handle the music, and allows the use of its function when other scenes are using it.
